Comment: Given the climate crisis, it's bad enough Trump is back in the White House.   But on top of that, his maladministration of the economy, his corrupt subordinates, and the attempt to delete habeas corpus have sucked almost all the oxygen out of Earth Day this year.
Author: clamorous_owle

Comment: That one needs to go into the compactor immediately. Then the compost heap.
Author: ScotchCigarsEspresso
